sentences.sContent: The United States is north of the equator.
sentences.sContent_eng: The United States is north of the equator.

sentences.sContent: In the hot zone near the equator the sun heats the air continually; hence the air there ascends.
sentences.sContent_eng: In the hot zone near the equator the sun heats the air continually; hence the air there ascends.
sentences.sCn: 在靠近赤道的热带地区，太阳不断地加热那里的空气，于是那里的热空气就上升。

remMethod.val: equ(相等) + at + or → 将地球进行等分 → 赤道

trans.tranOther: an imaginary line drawn around the middle of the Earth that is exactly the same distance from the North Pole and the South Pole
